author: Megan Armstrong
title: Texans Donate $100K Toward Houston COVID-19 Recovery Fund
description: The  Houston Texans  have joined the collective effort to help the coronavirus pandemic response by  announcing  a $100,000 donation to the United Way of Greater Houston and Greater Houston Community Foundation on Wednesday...
content:
David J. Phillip/Associated Press
The Houston Texans have joined the collective effort to help the coronavirus pandemic response by announcing a $100,000 donation to the United Way of Greater Houston and Greater Houston Community Foundation on Wednesday.
